title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.99 - Material incorporated by reference

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.99 - Material incorporated by reference

State Regulations
(a) Documents. The following documents, referenced in this Part, are available for review and copying at the
department's offices in Room 510, 625 Broadway, Albany: (1)
16 USC
470
et seq., 668dd, 668ee, 669-669i, 715, 777- 777i, 777k, 1271 et seq.; 1982, supplement, 1987. (2)

Title 16, chapter 23 of the USC; 1982, supplement, 1987. (3)

Title 16, chapter 35 of the USC; 1982, supplement, 1987. (4)
42
USC
2021b
et seq.; 1983, supplement, 1987. (5)
42
USC
10101(12); 1983, supplement, 1987. (6)
42 USC
4001
et seq.; 1983, supplement, 1987. (7)

Section 11e(2) of the

Atomic Energy Act, 42 USC
2011
et seq.;1983, supplement, 1987. (8)

Executive Order 11988, Floodplain Management Guidelines,Codification of Presidential Proclamations and

Executive Orders, 1961-1985, and 42 Fed. Reg. 26951
(1977). (9)

Standard Format and Content of a License

Application for a Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Facility - Safety

Analysis Report, U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NUREG-1199), Revision 2, January 1991. (10)

Quality

Assurance Guidance for a Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Facility, U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NUREG-1293), Revision 1, April 1991. (b) Availability of documents. (1)

Documents (1) through (7), (8) [42

Federal Register26951 (1977)], (9), and (10) can be obtained from the

Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, DC
20402. (2)

Codification of

Presidential Proclamations and Executive Orders, 1961-1985 [document (8)] can
be obtained from the Superintendent of Documents, Government Book Store, 240

East Ninth Street, Cleveland, OH 44199. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.99

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
